Orphan support

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'Is good to have empathy?'}, {'role': 'assistant', 'content': "Empathy is generally considered a positive trait as it allows people to understand and relate to others' feelings and perspectives. This can lead to better communication, stronger relationships, and more effective problem-solving.
